quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Game and Tigers
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, john, maradona. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the worst defeat by points that the Missouri Tigers had during the 20th century?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 77-0

questions.question: The University of Missouri lost their football team for almost a month.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In 1890 MIZZOU played its first football game against whom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Washington University

questions.question: What Hall of Fame coach was with the Tigers from 1958-1970?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dan Devine

questions.question: What player quarterbacked the Missouri Tigers in the 1997 Holiday Bowl?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Corby Jones

questions.question: Which of these former Missouri Tiger players has the most super bowl rings?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eric Wright

questions.question: In 1990 the Colorado Buffaloes beat the Tigers due to which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Both of these

questions.question: Lets say John and Judy are playing a mixed doubles match against Mary and Mike. Its Marys turn to serve. She starts the game by serving to Judy. Mary and Mike win the point. Now the score is 15-love. For the next point, who serves to whom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mary serves to John.

questions.question: Diego Maradona became friends with this political leader and even tattooed hit portrait on his left leg.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fidel Castro

questions.question: Nobody knows for sure why Love means nothing on a tennis court. Which of these theories is NOT one of the common theories of where this usage originated?

options.text: In the Dutch phrase, iets voor lof doen (to do something for nothing), lof means nothing.
In French, Lheure means The hour. Since some people think that the 15-30-40 scoring refers to 15, 30 and 40 minutes after the hour, the hour might mean zero.
In French, Loeuf means Egg and an egg is in the shape of a zero.
Love is a more pleasant word than zero. Since tennis is a highly civilized sport, love evolved as a tactful way of denoting a score zero.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Love is a more pleasant word than zero. Since tennis is a highly civilized sport, love evolved as a tactful way of denoting a score zero.

questions.question: In 1978 the Missouri Tigers travelled to Nebraska and won 35-31. What year was the next Tiger victory over Nebraska ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2003

questions.question: Who replaced coach Don Faurot when he retired in 1956?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frank Broyles

questions.question: The first 20 games of the Tiger/ Jayhawk rivalry were played off campus in Kansas City or in St Joesph. The Tigers hosted the first game on campus in 1911. What is significant about this game?

options.text: There was  a riot after the game.
The game was played at Rollins field.
It was the first Homecoming game in the country.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was the first Homecoming game in the country.

questions.question: What institution was founded on October 30, 1998 in the city of Rosario, Santa Fe, Argentina in honor of football legend Diego Maradona?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Church of Maradona

questions.question: Who is Mizzous arch rival in all sports?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kansas Jayhawks

quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Net and Opponent
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, serves, champions. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: If you hit the tennis ball toward your opponent, and hes standing at the net, and he reaches over the net and hits the ball before it crosses over the net to his side of the court, and it lands in your court, and then you hit it out of bounds, who wins the point and why?

options.text: You win the point because your opponents racket crossed over the net into your court.
Your opponent wins the point because he was able to hit the ball before it got to his side of the net.
You win the point because your opponent hit the ball before it crossed into his side of the court.
Your opponent wins the point because you hit it out.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: You win the point because your opponent hit the ball before it crossed into his side of the court.

questions.question: In tennis, how much time does the server have between the time the previous point ends and the time he/she serves the ball for the next point, to avoid being cited by the umpire for delaying the game?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 20 seconds

questions.question: A player can win a set without winning the majority of the games.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: When was Italian football club A.C. Milan founded?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 16 December 1899

questions.question: In what year did AC Milan win their first UEFA champions league final?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1963

questions.question: Lets say you hit the ball so hard back to your opponent that it hits him in the chest. He does not hit the ball back. Who wins the point, and why?

options.text: You win the point because your opponent touched the ball with his body.
Your opponent wins the point because you used unnecessary force.
You win the point because your opponent didnt hit the ball back to your side of the court.
Your opponent wins the point because you engaged in unsportsmanlike conduct.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: You win the point because your opponent touched the ball with his body.

questions.question: Which of these famous Italians are known as A.C Milan fans?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Laura Pausini and Cristina Scabbia

questions.question: This football player, who spent his entire career with Serie A club A.C. Milan, has been acknowledged as one of the greatest defenders ever to play the game.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Franco Baresi

questions.question: What is the sequence of serves in a 7-point tie-break?

options.text: Player A serves to the deuce court. Player A then serves to the Ad court. Player B then serves to the deuce court. Player B then serves to the Ad court.
Player A serves to the deuce court. Player B then serves to the Ad court. Player B then serves to the deuce court. Player A then serves to the Ad court.
Player A serves to the Ad court. Player B then serves to the deuce court. Player B then serves to the Ad court. Player A then serves to the deuce court.
Player A serves to the deuce court. Player B then serves to the Ad court. Player A then serves to the Ad court. Player B then serves to the deuce court.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Player A serves to the deuce court. Player B then serves to the Ad court. Player B then serves to the deuce court. Player A then serves to the Ad court.

questions.question: Your opponent in tennis hits a drop shot. It lands just on your side of the net. You run as fast as you can to get to it. Your opponent has hit it with so much slice (back-spin) that, before you can get to it, it bounces back over to his side of the net. Your opponent then hits the ball out of bounds. Who wins the point, if anybody, and why?

options.text: You win the point, because your opponents previous shot, the drop-shot which bounced back over to his side of the court, was an illegal shot.
Nobody wins the point. Its a let. Whenever a hit ball bounces on one side of the net and goes back to the other side of the net without being hit back, the point is played over.
You win the point, because your opponent hit the ball out.
Your opponent wins the point, because you failed to hit the ball back to his side of the net when he hit the drop shot.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Your opponent wins the point, because you failed to hit the ball back to his side of the net when he hit the drop shot.

questions.question: Lets say your opponent hits a shot to your side of the net, but he hits it so far over to one side of the tennis court that, when you finally get to it, youre way off to the side of the court. You hit the ball so that it goes around the outside of the net, landing in your opponents court. Your shot did not go over the net. Rather, it went around the net. Your opponent then misses the shot. Who wins the point, if anybody?

options.text: You win the point. Its not required to hit the ball over the net. It can go over the net or around it.
Nobody wins the point. This is a let. The point is played over.
Your opponent wins the point. Your shot around the outside of the net was not a legal shot.  The tennis ball has to go over the net to be in play.
This situation is impossible. It isnt physically possible to hit the ball around the outside of the net.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: You win the point. Its not required to hit the ball over the net. It can go over the net or around it.

questions.question: Which A.C Milan former player was close to becoming president of his native country?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Weah

questions.question: What is the color of A.C. Milans home jersey?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: red and black stripes

questions.question: In 3 of the 4 major tennis tournaments, the deciding set of the match (5th set for men, 3rd set for women) does not utilize a tie break if the score is tied at 6-6. In which of these tournaments is a tie break used even in the deciding set of a match?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: U.S. Open

questions.question: Who acquired soccer club A.C. Milan in 1986?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Silvio Berlusconi

quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Air and Balloon
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, pastrana, abbreviation. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: If you are at 10 meters of depth, and fill a balloon with one liter of air from the cylinder, and then ascend to the surface, what will happen to the balloon?

options.text: The balloon will shrink to a volume of 1/3 liter.
The balloon will shrink to a volume of 1/2 liter.
The balloon will expand to a volume of 2 liters, and possibly burst.
The balloon will expand to a volume of 1 1/2 liters, and possibly burst.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The balloon will expand to a volume of 2 liters, and possibly burst.

questions.question: If you blow up a balloon to a volume of one liter of air at the surface, and then take the balloon down to a depth of 10 meters, what will happen?

options.text: The balloon will decrease in volume to 1/2 liter.
The balloon will increase in volume to 2 liters.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The balloon will decrease in volume to 1/2 liter.

questions.question: When Utah first broke the BCS, they played against this team in this BCS Bowl Game.

questions.question: Under what circumstances is it okay to touch underwater creatures?

options.text: You can touch underwater creatures if you are not wearing gloves.
You can touch underwater creatures if you are wearing gloves.
Under no circumstances should you touch underwater creatures.
You can touch underwater creatures if they are not dangerous.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Under no circumstances should you touch underwater creatures.

options.text: To keep water from going up your nose
To allow you to breathe through your nose

questions.question: If you are diving and begin to choke, what should you do?

options.text: Hold your breath and swim to the surface immediately.
Take off your regulator and cough.
Swim to the surface immediately, exhaling as you go.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cough into the regulator.

questions.question: What device reduces the pressure in the cylinder to the pressure of the surroundings, so that the diver will always be breathing in air at the appropriate pressure of the current depth?

questions.question: When you are breathing compressed air at depth, a certain amount of the air gets dissolved in the tissues of your body. When you ascend, what happens to this dissolved air?

options.text: It comes out of solution, forming gas bubbles in your tissues.
It passes into your urine, whence it is excreted when you go to the bathroom.
It moves into your brain, causing you to become delirious.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It comes out of solution, forming gas bubbles in your tissues.

questions.question: What gas is the most abundant gas in the atmospheric air we breathe every day?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nitrogen
